story.kicker_image_caption: Nandish Sandhu might join Naagin 2; Arjun Bijlani will not be part of the second season.
story.storykicker: Apparently, Mouni Roy will play Ritik and Shivanya's daughter in the next season.
story.storybody:
The last episode of the first season of Naagin will air on June 5 and Ekta Kapoor's supernatural show Kawach will replace Mouni Roy-Arjun Bijlani starrer.

Good news is that the second season will go on the floors in less than 100 days from now, according to reports.

However, Season 2 will apparently not star TV's current heartthrob Arjun Bijlani. Mouni Roy will continue to be the protagonist of the show; she'll play Shivanya and Ritik's daughter. Also, Nandish Sandhu of Uttaran fame is expected to be part of Naagin 2.

Also read: Naagin team says goodbye; Mouni Roy, Arjun Bijlani, Adaa Khan click selfies on last day

Aashka Goradia has already joined the cast of Naagin as the Queen of Mahishmati and will be seen in a prominent role in the second season.

Apart from Aashka, a host of other baddies will be added to the cast. So, if you are heartbroken with the news of Naagin going off air, it's time to celebrate now.

Also read: Four shocking twists you can expect to see in the Naagin finale
story.magazinekicker: Apparently, Mouni Roy will play Ritik and Shivanya's daughter in the next season.
